name: Al Muqtadir
description: Al Muqtadir is one of the names of Allah in Islam, which means 'The Powerful' or 'The Omnipotent.' This name conveys the concept of absolute power and authority, indicating that Allah has complete control over all things.
summary: The name signifies Allah's capability to execute His will and manage all affairs of creation. It emphasizes His strength and the fact that nothing occurs without His permission. Derived from the Arabic root 'q-d-r,' which relates to power and capability, Al Muqtadir is mentioned in the Quran, reflecting the attributes of strength and supreme authority.
